item.title: STL基础用法
item.description: 排序 1.sort()模板函数 #include<iostream>#include<algorithm> using namespace std; int main() { int a[10]= {9,6,3,8,5,2,7,4,1,0}; for(int i=0; i<10; i++) cout<<a[i]<<""; cout<<endl; //数组长度 cout << sizeof(a)/sizeof(a[0]) << endl; sort(a,a+10);//注意是加上数组长度 for(int i=0; i<10; i++) cout<<a[i]<<""; return 0; } 2.桶排序 #include<iostream>#include<algorithm> using namespace std; int main() { int x, n; cin >> n; int a[100] = {0}; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { cin >> x; a[x]++; } for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) { for (int m = 1; m <= a[i]; m++) { cout << i << ""; } } } 3.
